title: Ep 145: One Nation Under Bachelor with 2 Black Girls 1 Rose
itunes:title: Ep 145: One Nation Under Bachelor with 2 Black Girls 1 Rose
itunes:subtitle: Kate is ready for a drastic hair chop and Doree puts together a Sephora Sale list. Then, Justine Kay and Natasha Scott (2 Black Girls, 1 Rose Podcast) join them to discuss what self-care looks like when they aren’t watching The Bachelor, how their “sel...
description:
Kate is ready for a drastic hair chop and Doree puts together a Sephora Sale list. Then, Justine Kay and Natasha Scott (2 Black Girls, 1 Rose Podcast) join them to discuss what self-care looks like when they aren’t watching The Bachelor, how their “self love journey is parallel with their hair journey,” discuss their reactions to a recent episode (spoiler alert!), and what keeps them coming back to the Bachelor.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. And visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
